name: Dragon Ball Z - Ultimate End
description:
Disclaimer: The following video game is a non-profit fan made game and is being shared purely for educational purposes. DragonBall, Z, GT and Super all belong to Akira Toriyama, FUNimation, Toei Animation, and Fuji TV. Support official releases.

Collect 7 Dragon Balls and become the strongest in the Universe!

Controls

Space - Start Game/Interact

WASD/Directional Arrows - Walk around Overworld

I - Inventory

LMB - Open and Close Boxes

Esc - To Close and Quit the Game

Capsule Corp Logos are Save Points.

Red Capsule Corp Logo is to Reset your game.
